spec_data.Name: libvirt-daemon-driver-nodedev
spec_data.Description:
The nodedev driver plugin for the libvirtd daemon, providing
an implementation of the node device APIs using the udev
capabilities.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 16 Sep 2017 03:14:27 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Nodedev driver plugin for the libvirtd daemon
